verses.text: On one of these days, when Jesus was teaching the people in the Temple Courts and telling the good news, the chief priests and the teachers of the Law, joined by the elders, confronted him,
and addressing him, said, “Tell us what authority you have to do these things. Who is it who has given you this authority?”

“\+w I|strong="G1473"\+w*, \+w too|strong="G2532"\+w*,”said Jesus in reply, “\+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ask|strong="G2065"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w question|strong="G2065"\+w*. \+w Give|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w an|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w answer|strong="G3056"\+w* \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w*.

\+w It|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w about|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w John|strong="G2491"\+w*’s baptism – \+w was|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w it|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* divine \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* human origin?”
But they began arguing together, “If we say ‘divine,’ he will say ‘Why didn’t you believe him?’
But, if we say ‘human,’ the people will all stone us, for they are persuaded that John was a prophet.”
So they answered that they did not know its origin.

“\+w Then|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w*,”said Jesus, “refuse \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w what|strong="G4169"\+w* \+w authority|strong="G1849"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w these|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w things|strong="G3778"\+w*.”

But Jesus began to tell the people this parable – “\+w A|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w man|strong="G3778"\+w* once \+w planted|strong="G5452"\+w* \+w a|strong="G2532"\+w* vineyard, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w then|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w let|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w out|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w tenants|strong="G1092"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w went|strong="G2532"\+w* abroad \+w for|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w a|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w long|strong="G2425"\+w* \+w while|strong="G5550"\+w*.

\+w He|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w put|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w those|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w tenants|strong="G1092"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* death, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w let|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* vineyard \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w others|strong="G3588"\+w*.”“Heaven forbid!” they exclaimed when they heard it.

But Jesus looked at them and said, “\+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w then|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1519"\+w* meaning \+w of|strong="G2776"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* passage? – ‘\+w The|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w stone|strong="G3037"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w builders|strong="G3618"\+w* despised \+w has|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w now|strong="G1161"\+w* itself \+w become|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w cornerstone|strong="G2776"\+w*.’

\+w Everyone|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w who|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w falls|strong="G4098"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w stone|strong="G3037"\+w* \+w will|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w be|strong="G3956"\+w* dashed \+w to|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w pieces|strong="G4917"\+w*, \+w while|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w anyone|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w it|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w falls|strong="G4098"\+w* – \+w it|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w will|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w scatter|strong="G3039"\+w* \+w him|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w as|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w dust|strong="G3039"\+w*.”

After this the teachers of the Law and the chief priest were eager to lay hands on Jesus then and there, but they were afraid of the people; for they saw that it was at them that he had aimed this parable.

Having watched their opportunity, they afterward sent some spies, who pretended to be good men, to catch Jesus in the course of conversation, and so enable them to give him up to the Governor’s jurisdiction and authority.

These spies asked Jesus a question. They said, “Teacher, we know that you are right in what you say and teach, and that you do not take any account of a person’s position, but teach the way of God honestly;
are we right in paying tribute to the Emperor or not?”
Seeing through their deceitfulness, Jesus said to them,

“\+w Show|strong="G1166"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w a|strong="G2192"\+w* coin. \+w Whose|strong="G5101"\+w* head \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* title \+w are|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w*?”

“The Emperor’s,” they said; and Jesus replied, “\+w Well|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w then|strong="G2532"\+w*, pay \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* Emperor \+w what|strong="G3588"\+w* belongs \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* Emperor, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w what|strong="G3588"\+w* belongs \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*.”
They could not object to this answer before the people; and, in their wonder at his reply, they held their tongues.
Presently there came up some Sadducees, who maintain that there is no resurrection. Their question was this –

“Teacher, Moses laid down for us in his writings that – ‘Should a man’s married brother die, and should he be childless, the man should take the widow as his wife, and raise up a family for his brother.’
Well, there were once seven brothers; of whom the eldest, after taking a wife, died childless.
The second and third brothers both took her as their wife;
and so, too, did all seven – dying without children.
The woman herself was the last to die.
About the woman, then – at the resurrection, whose wife is she to be, all seven brothers having had her as their wife?”

“\+w The|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w men|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* women \+w of|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* world,”said Jesus, “\+w marry|strong="G1060"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w are|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w given|strong="G1061"\+w* \+w in|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w marriage|strong="G1061"\+w*;
